Question
========

Suppose it is given that for a given patient population, the hemoglobin (Hb) level is normally distributed with μ = 12 and σ = 0.7. We randomly draw one person from this population. How high should the Hb of this person be at most to belong to the lowest 20% of the population? belong?

Answerlist
----------

* 10.9913
* 11.4109
* 11.5318
* 12.0688

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 10.9913: Incorrect
* 11.4109: Correct
* 11.5318: Incorrect
* 12.0688: Incorrect
